long_description: The Burton Fray jacket is for boys who live to ride. Its warmth and style combine with full weatherproof protection for all-day fun on the slopes. Polyester shell with DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) waterproof, breathable coating and taped critical seams helps keeps the snow and water at bay. Thermacore(TM) insulation ensures reliable warmth on harsh winter days; soft nylon taffeta lining helps disperse excess moisture and dries quickly. Helmet-friendly hood maximizes peripheral vision and provides warmth and protection on long chairlift rides. Cuffs adjust quickly with rip-and-stick tabs to keep out snow and cold; microfleece chin guard prevents chafing. Water-resistant powder skirt with pant attachments prevents snow from penetrating jacket; drawcord hem seals in warmth. The Burton Fray jacket features an interior music player pocket with cable port, goggles pocket, hand pockets, chest pockets and a pass pocket with window.
short_description: The Burton Fray jacket is for boys who live to ride. Its warmth and style combine with full weatherproof protection for all-day fun on the slopes.
